alert.note: Alert for Broward (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 4:14PM EDT until April 12 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Broward County in southeastern Florida... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 414 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Port Everglades, or near Hollywood, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Dania Beach, Wilton Manors and Lazy Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
